explains: n. 误解，误会；小争执，分歧
v. 误解，误会（misunderstand 的现在分词形式）

sentences.en: I don't want there to be any misunderstanding.
I don't want this misunderstanding to come between us.
sentences.cn: 我不想让这种误解妨碍我们之间的关系。

sentences.en: He was the unknowing cause of all the misunderstanding.
sentences.cn: 他无意中引起了这一切误会。
